keywords.value: San Francisco Museum of Modern Art
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Corey Lee’s new restaurant regards chefs as practitioners of high culture and iconic dishes as works of art, like literature, music or painting.

headline.print_headline: A Menu True to the Already Tried
headline.main: This Is America’s Most Original New Restaurant

snippet: Corey Lee’s new restaurant regards chefs as practitioners of high culture and iconic dishes as works of art, like literature, music or painting....
abstract: Pete Wells Critic's Notebook praises chef Corey Lee for creating In Situ, probably country's most original restaurant; unique establishment inside San Francisco Museum of Modern Art serves dishes that are faithful replicas of culinary masterpieces created by other chefs.
